title: Arnold Bax - Sym No 3 - V Handley, BBC Philc (2003) [Philidor]
description:
A latterday Romantic, Arnold Bax lost ground in the 1950s, as the British critical establishment sought to promote more recent musical trends to gain ground abroad. Bax's rhapsodic genius and brilliant sense of orchestration eventually won him new audiences in the 1980s and 1990s. His Third Symphony was seen as a watershed work even at its premiere, a piece whose strength, confidence and craft proclaimed Bax as one of Britain's leading symphonists.


Bio and images included. You can find my uploads by searching on Philidor, or by checking this thread:
 
https://pirates-forum.org/Thread-Philidor-s-uploads--63895
